channel.title: Basiux square is up for longest time, and "quadrado" is open just now! join in the slack-ish OS conversation :)
channel.description:
https://gitter.im/basiux/square
we need to get the conversation going!! :smile:
not sure if it's better to use gitter or slack, basiux or cregox. there are channels for all of them, (but all just in english).
#pt-BR
https://gitter.im/basiux/quadrado
ado, a-ado, precisamos pegar a conversacao indo!! ;P
se andar pra frente, vemo o resto.
